document_data.name: ''Harvest Cauldron''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''harvest cauldron''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[cauldron]] or [[cooking pot]] that could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''harvest cauldron'' could be used to create the effect of the ''[[heroes' feast]]'' spell.
document_data.History: Sometime during the late 15{{th}} century, the ''harvest cauldron'' came into the possession of [[Pikel Bouldershoulder]], who was in the habit of using pots as [[helmet]]s in battle. He was said to consider the preparation of a hearty meal for his friends to be one of his most important rituals.
document_data.Notable Owners:
[[File:Pikel WoW.png|thumb|250px|''Pikel Bouldershoulder wearing the ''harvest cauldron'' as a helmet.'']]
* Pikel Bouldershoulder, a [[dwarf]] [[druid]] who wore the ''harvest cauldron'' on his head during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
